email_chain.subject: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Vessel details: DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Freight rate is $18.50/MT CIF. Laycan 25-30 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $17.00/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your response. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $20,000/day. The best I can do is $17.50/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed at $17.50/MT. Please send the recap.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Iron Ore
- Cargo Size: 150,000MT
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Freight Rate: $17.50/MT CIF
- Laycan: 25-30 October
- Demurrage: $20,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Iron Ore Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the contract.

Best,
Sarah
